      • getShoppingList

        public ShoppingList getShoppingList(int id,
                                    java.lang.String email)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method that gets a shopping list given the shopping list id, if the user has permission.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the shopping list you are trying to get.
        email - The email of the requesting user.
        Returns:
        Returns the shopping list that corresponds to the id given.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when failing to get shopping list.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when failing to get shopping lists.
